reviews.subject: Introduction to Algorithms
reviews.review: Dr. Ross is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable, but sometimes the pace of the class is a bit fast.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: The course content is solid, but Prof. Nguyen could be more engaging in her delivery.

reviews.subject: Database Systems
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's classes are both informative and fun. He provides real-world examples that make the material relevant.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows her stuff, but sometimes the assignments can be a bit too challenging.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is an expert in AI and his passion for the subject is contagious. Highly recommend his class!

reviews.subject: Software Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Green is thorough in her explanations, but the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: The content is interesting, but Dr. White's lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Discrete Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Adams is great at breaking down complex topics, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Computer Architecture
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a fantastic professor. His classes are well-organized and the material is presented clearly.

reviews.subject: Human-Computer Interaction
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson is knowledgeable, but the class could benefit from more practical examples.

reviews.subject: Data Mining
reviews.review: Dr. King provides valuable insights into data mining, but the coursework can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Web Development
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is an excellent teacher. She keeps the class engaged and makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Cryptography
reviews.review: The course is challenging, and Dr. Parker's explanations can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Cybersecurity
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is a cybersecurity expert and her classes are very informative. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Mobile Application Development
reviews.review: Dr. Young is a great professor, but the projects can be time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Natural Language Processing
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is passionate about NLP, but the class could use more hands-on practice.

reviews.subject: Cloud Computing
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is an expert in cloud computing and provides valuable insights. His class is a must-take.

reviews.subject: Blockchain Technology
reviews.review: The content is fascinating, but Prof. Scott's lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Quantum Computing
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is very knowledgeable, but the concepts can be difficult to grasp without a strong background in physics.
